desc: The course provides a capstone to the major. Taught as a seminar, it offers an opportunity for students to integrate their studies of women across disciplines and to become more aware of the intricate web of gender, race, culture, and class that informs women's experiences. Prerequisite: Women's Studies 121. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Sem: Women Embodied
notes: Open to Junior and Senior Women's Studies majors only, except by permission of instructor.
title: Advanced Topics in Women's Studies
